decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of  five years from the date of this permission.  REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building.  REASON:	To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings. | As measured at the boundaries of the air conditioning plant, noise levels shall not exceed those outlined in the 1974 Act and 1992 Act at any time.  REASON:  To protect persons within and around the application site. | Equipment and installation within the air conditioning plant shall not rise above radiation exposure levels outlined in the Health & Safety at Work Act 1974 and Management of Health & Safety at Work Regulations 1992.  REASON:  To protect persons within and around the application site. | Environmental Health require that acoustic standards around the air conditioning plant shall satisfy the Health and Safety at Work Act 1974 and Management of Health and Safety at Work Regulation 1992.  REASON:  To protect persons within and living around the application site. | Environmental Health require that the proposed installation and equipment in the air conditioning plant shall satisfy the Health & Safety at Work Act 1974 and Health & Safety at Work Regulation 1992 in respect of radiation exposure levels.  REASON:  To protect persons within and around the application site.
description: Link bridge between main building and industrial block; plant enclosure and relocation of 2 satellite dishes on roof of industrial building
